resources.string: Find Ringtones of your taste. Play and Download
Ringtones from Hindi songs are here. We cut best part of the song that can be made ringtone and make you available. Get now enjoy.
Mix of Song - DJ Tones are here. Heavy sounds, creatives sounds combined with song, makes a perfect ringtone for the rock stars.
Tiger, Elephant, Deer all such animals sound in your phone. Scare your friends with the natural animal sounds
Boom, Dhoom, Dhoooo, Foooo and all sounds. Creatively composed for your phone. Sometimes beautiful , sometimes scary all kinds of creative sounds are here.

For Creating Real App: I will create ringtones and host it in my website http://pradeepbehera.in/, take API from there and show it in my app. There are API for songs but I could not find any API for ringtones. Hence I will use my own hosted ringtones.
This app will be using Google In App Billing for processing payments.
